head.title: Give McDonald's Its Due: Taste the Product

hedline.hl1: Give McDonald's Its Due: Taste the Product

block.p: I take exception to the small piece titled "McDonald's New Burger" (March 17). Caroline Levy of Shearson Lehman is quoted as saying of the company's low-calorie offering: "This doesn't even taste like a burger, based on what I've heard." Mind you, I have no financially driven interest in McDonald's, but I think that Ms. Levy should have given more thought to her analysis (i.e. kill the product). All it takes is one or two uninformed people to make or break a product. In short, Ms. Levy, Mimi Sheraton tastes the food. MARTIN J. JOHNSON New York, March 19
